normapi

Class NormAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • normapi.NormAPI

  • public class NormAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    NormAPI normalizes/transforms a String or the entries in a file into its normalized form

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • normalize_File

        public static void normalize_File(java.lang.String filePath)
        This method normalizes the entries in a file using the default approach (SMTbeforeDSA).
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path of the corpus

      • normalize_Text

        public static java.lang.String normalize_Text(java.lang.String shortcutText)
        This method normalizes the text using the default approach (SMTbeforeDSA) followed by the Dictionary Substitution Approach.
        Parameters:
        shortcutText - the text to be normalized
        Returns:
        normalizedText - the normalized version of the shortcut text

      • normalizeDSA_File

        public static void normalizeDSA_File(java.lang.String filePath)
        This method normalizes the entries in a file using the Dictionary Substitution Approach.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path of the corpus

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        normalizedText - the normalized version of the shortcut text

        This method normalizes the text using the Statistical Machine Translation.
        Parameters:
        shortcutText - the text to be normalized
        Returns:
        normalizedText - the normalized version of the shortcut text

      • normalizeSMTafterDSA_Text

        public static java.lang.String normalizeSMTafterDSA_Text(java.lang.String shortcutText)
        This method normalizes the text using the Dictionary Substitution Approach followed by the Statistical Machine Translation.
        Parameters:
        shortcutText - the text to be normalized
        Returns:
        finalNormalizedText - the normalized version of the shortcut text

      • normalizeSMTbeforeDSA_Text

        public static java.lang.String normalizeSMTbeforeDSA_Text(java.lang.String shortcutText)
        This method normalizes the text using the Statistical Machine Translation followed by the Dictionary Substitution Approach.
        Parameters:
        shortcutText - the text to be normalized
        Returns:
        finalNormalizedText - the normalized version of the shortcut text

      • setDictionary

        public static void setDictionary(java.lang.String dictionaryFilePath)
        This method changes the word dictionary accessed by the Dictionary Substitution Approach.
        Parameters:
        dictionaryFilePath - The file path of the new dictionary

      • setConfigurationFile

        public static void setConfigurationFile(java.lang.String configurationFilePath)
        This method changes the configuration file (.ini) accessed by the Statistical Machine Translation (Moses).
        Parameters:
        configurationFilePath - The file path of the new Moses configuration file

      • getBLEU

        public static java.lang.String getBLEU(java.lang.String referenceFilePath,
                       java.lang.String candidateFilePath)
        This method calculates the BLEU score of an output
        Parameters:
        referenceFilePath - file path of the reference file
        candidateFilePath - file path of the candidate file
        Returns:
        BLEUScore - the BLEU Score of the candidate file

      • dictionaryAppend_Text

        public static void dictionaryAppend_Text(java.lang.String inputText,
                         java.lang.String outputText)
        This method appends a given entry into the dictionary.
        Parameters:
        inputText - the word placed in the input tag
        outputText - the word placed in the output tag

      • dictionaryAppend_File

        public static void dictionaryAppend_File(java.lang.String dictionaryFilePath)
        This method appends a given file's entries into the dictionary. The delimiter used is '-'
        Parameters:
        dictionaryFilePath - the file path of the text file to be added

      • train

        public static void train(java.lang.String mainName,
         java.lang.String sourceName,
         java.lang.String sourceFilePath,
         java.lang.String targetName,
         java.lang.String targetFilePath)
        This method trains the SMT's model through the given source and target text files.
        Parameters:
        mainName - the main name used for the directory and file names (e.g. mainName.sourceName/mainName.targetName)
        sourceName - the name of the source file (e.g. shortcut)
        sourceFilePath - the file path of the source
        targetName - the name of the target file (e.g. normalized)
        targetFilePath - the file path of the target

      • train_append

        public static void train_append(java.lang.String sourceFilePath,
                java.lang.String targetFilePath)
        This method retrains the default SMT model (norm) through the added entries in the source and target text files.
        Parameters:
        sourceFilePath - the file path of the source (e.g. shortcut) to be included
        targetFilePath - the file path of the target (e.g. normalized) to be included

      • createLM

        public static void createLM(java.lang.String targetFilePath,
            java.lang.String lmFilePath)
        This method creates the language model of a given file. Reminder: If used for the API, either use the train function or always end the language model's file name with .lm.
        Parameters:
        targetFilePath - the reference for creating the language model
        lmFilePath - the file path of where the language model will be placed

      • dictionarySubstitution_File

        public static void dictionarySubstitution_File(java.lang.String filePathIn,
                               java.lang.String filePathOut)
        This method is the direct function of normalizing a file using the Dictionary Substitution Approach.
        Parameters:
        filePathIn - path of the file to be normalized
        filePathOut - file path of the normalized version

      • dictionarySubstitution_Text

        public static java.lang.String dictionarySubstitution_Text(java.lang.String shortcutText)
        This method is the direct function of normalizing a text using the Dictionary Substitution Approach.
        Parameters:
        shortcutText - the text to be normalized
        Returns:
        normalizedText - normalized version of the input text

      • statisticalMachineTranslation_File

        public static void statisticalMachineTranslation_File(java.lang.String filePathIn,
                                      boolean first)
        This method is the direct function of normalizing a file using the Statistical Machine Translation.
        Parameters:
        filePathIn - path of the file to be normalized
        first - indicator if the approach is the first one to be executed

      • statisticalMachineTranslation_Text

        public static java.lang.String statisticalMachineTranslation_Text(java.lang.String shortcutText)
        This method is the direct function of normalizing a text using the Statistical Machine Translation.
        Parameters:
        shortcutText - the text to be normalized
        Returns:
        normalizedText - the normalized version of the shortcut text
